Package com.cafean.jobstream.common.util.download

Interface Downloader

  • public interface Downloader
    A job stream download process.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void cancel()
      Cancel the currently active download process.
      static void checkCancelled()
      If the user has cancelled the download then a DownloadCancelledException will be thrown.
      void dispose()
      Dispose of any resources no longer needed after the download has completed or been cancelled.
      java.lang.String getStreamDisplayString()
      Return a string that can be used to identify the stream being downloaded to the user.
      void removeDownloadedFiles()
      Remove any files downloaded after being cancelled.
      void start()
      Begins the downloading process.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Begins the downloading process. Note that this may be called from the Swing event thread and thus should execute quickly.

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        Cancel the currently active download process.

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Dispose of any resources no longer needed after the download has completed or been cancelled.

      • removeDownloadedFiles

        void removeDownloadedFiles()
        Remove any files downloaded after being cancelled.

      • getStreamDisplayString

        java.lang.String getStreamDisplayString()
        Return a string that can be used to identify the stream being downloaded to the user. This will be used for tab names, dialog titles, etc..
        Returns:
        an identifying string for the stream being downloaded

      • checkCancelled

        static void checkCancelled()
        If the user has cancelled the download then a DownloadCancelledException will be thrown.
